references.paper_title: SLIC superpixels compared to state-of-the-art superpixel methods
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the superpixel segmentation method used in the initialization stage of the proposed 3D planar reconstruction pipeline.

references.paper_title: Scannet: Richly-annotated 3d reconstructions of indoor scenes
references.reason: The ScanNet dataset, introduced in this paper, is the primary benchmark dataset used for evaluating the performance of the proposed 3D planar reconstruction method.

references.paper_title: Modular primitives for high-performance differentiable rendering
references.reason: This paper presents NVDiffrast, a key differentiable rendering framework leveraged for efficient and differentiable rendering of AlphaTablets, a core component of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Planercnn: 3d plane detection and reconstruction from a single image
references.reason: This paper introduces Planercnn, a significant prior work in learning-based 3D plane reconstruction that is related to and compared against the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Atlas: End-to-end 3d scene reconstruction from posed images
references.reason: Atlas is a strong baseline method for 3D scene reconstruction used for comparison, highlighting the advancements of the proposed approach.
